content.html: If git won and GitHub fail: - Code review will be in Gerrit - PR replaced by patchset - issue/bug tracker replaced either by mailing-list or taskwarrior - SourceForge will be home for many OSS code +sourcehut.org is a good example of modernizing git classic workflow
content.value:
If git won and GitHub fail:
- Code review will be in Gerrit
- PR replaced by patchset
- issue/bug tracker replaced either by mailing-list or taskwarrior
- SourceForge will be home for many OSS code

+sourcehut.org is a good example of modernizing git classic workflow
